Possible Friends

Shows which people voted most similarly to Kevin Rudd in Parliament. This is measured from 0% agreement (never voted the same) to 100% (always voted the same). Only votes that both attended are counted. This may reveal relationships between people that were previously unsuspected. Or it may be nonsense.

They Vote For You

A site dedicated to making parliamentary voting information accessible, understandable, and easy to use so that you can hold your elected representatives to account.
